name: DashCarde
description:
Hey there and welcome !

Dash in this adventure in arcades against people that are trying to bullying you by throwing stuffs at you. You will have to dash to dodge and repel these to their owners to destroy them.

Survive as long as possible, waves of enemies after others.  (and of the killbugs haha we are fixing it this week end!)

DashCarde was made in the context of the Weekly Game Jam 122 with the constraint “One action”.

This game was made by a team of students from Bellecour Ecole :

  • DELMAS Quentin (Game Designer, Sound Designer)
  • POTTIER Erwann (Game Designer, Programmer)
  • DO NASCIMENTO GONCALVES Samuel (Game Designer, Level Designer)
  • DECUYPER Sébastien (Game Designer, UI)
  • AVAR Julian (Game Designer, Programmer)
  • FRADIN Antoine (2D Animator)
  • VIGOUROUX Alice (2D Animator)
  • PG Asia (2D Animator)

Controls:

Pad / Arrows to move Left or Right;

A / Space to Dash;
